short_summary: Help Desk and System Monitoring Functions
full_summary:
===============

### Government Tender Announcement
#### W6369-23P5PA - Help Desk and System Monitoring Functions

*   **Tender Reference:** WS4300373641-Doc4300633567
*   **Amendment Number:** 4
*   **Solicitation Number:** WS4300373641
*   **Publication Date:** November 9, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date:** December 18, 2023, 14:00:00 EST
*   **Amendment Date:** December 11, 2023

**Requirement Overview:**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) and the Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) issued this closing amendment in response to W6369-23P5PQ to accommodate a bidder who has registered 9 days prior to the offer closing date.

**Key Details:**

*   **Contract Type:** Selective Tendering - Competitive
*   **Contract Period:** 3 years with 2 one-year option periods for extension
*   **Procurement Category:** SRV
*   **Services Required:**

    *   Help Desk and system monitoring functions
    *   Technical writing capabilities
    *   Web development
    *   Programmer analyst functions

**Business Requirements:**

*   Provide services to minimize the operational impact on DND and CAF during planned and unplanned outages
*   Coordinate with multiple stakeholders to ensure service continuity

**Trade Agreements:**

*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

**Contact Information:**

*   **Ankoor Patel (SPAC/PSPC)**
    *   Email: <enkoor.patel@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>
    *
